How do I use CUPS?: ... what model printer do you have?

.... Usually but not allways, printers are set up during installation.  The CUPS printer drivers cover cover a good many printers-but some, like my Canon IP6000 are not supported.  the IP4000 driver is listed, but it will not work with a 6000 model.
